_sText:
jb_paradise_prison

Welcome in the first paradise prison ! This place had been built for the dangerous people. Hell is full, God at to take a decision to save his territory.

Games

14 games. I guess it's good for a jb map :)

  • Gravity : You have to fly to the end

  • Race : A mario kart-like race with 3 winners

  • Football : A football with 8 songs when a team scores

  • Volley : 2 Team have to throw the ball to the other side

  • Breakfloor : Ts have to destroy glasses with smoke grenades

  • Arena : Regenering Arena for last request

  • Deathcrate : Ts have to dodge the box

  • Disco : I've put 3 classics songs, just shoot the button to pick a music

  • Bananas : You'll have to press as fast as you can the face to make jumping the banana. The fastest win the game.

  • Grenade : Players are resized and will have grenade to teamkill the other

  • Bhop/Climb : An hard BHOP with "noob mode" which disable teleportation

  • Obstacle course (the church) : Players have to dodge the fire & lava to end the race as fast as they can

  • Burnout Cars : Players have to push other cars to the death

  • Minecart : Players have to dodge minecarts to survive

Secrets & Event

In this map there are lot of secrets & items

  • The Shield : Special weapon for CT, it will protect them to be cut
  • The sword : Guess it counter the shield, a long sword that deals dommage
  • Pedobear Head (Kamikaze) : This one will explose & destroy everything around it
  • JOOOHN CENAAAAA : A stupid item that will destroy your ears and make a beautiful particle, that's all
  • Pushgun : Well it's just an item to troll the other and push them

I hope you will have fun guys,
See you later for more maps ?
